title: Picking Apples
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: Many students love eating apples! But do they know where apples come from? Picking Apples shows students what they might see while apple picking, such as farmers and tractors. Detailed photographs and use of the high-frequency word the supports early emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge as well as to classify information to better understand text.
reviewWords: apples, basket, farmer, friends, ladder, tractor
comprehension: Classify Information                : Classify information to understand text
awareness: Initial Sound                : Discriminate initial consonant /p/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word the
